name: Simon Survive
description:
Simon Survive

Welcome to Simon Survive!

This game, made in a week for the "A Jam :O" game jam with the theme "Repeat", is a hectic cross between the classic color pattern game Simon Says and a top-down 2D shooter. Remember the correct pattern of colors while avoiding the enemies' bullets (or shooting them if you're a pro). Try to beat the developer's high score of 9! I hope you enjoy since this is my first game!
